segments.text: Oh my goodness, look at that little boy climbing up to get cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so determined, stretching as high as he can to reach that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And his little sister is right there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're such a cute pair, working together to get a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how focused they are, like it's a big adventure for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really balancing carefully, trying not to tip the stool over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is so patient, just waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so quiet, trying not to get caught by their mom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a sweet moment, even if they are being a little sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it; it would make their day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I also hope they're careful and don't end up falling or making a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
